name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented QA Engineer with 8 years of experience in ensuring data quality and system reliability, specializing in **API Testing**, **REST APIs**, and **JSON Validation**. Proficient in using tools like **Postman**, **Newman**, **Cypress**, **Playwright**, and **Jest** to deliver robust test solutions. Adept at implementing systematic **Data Comparison** strategies and comprehensive **Documentation Skills** to improve overall project transparency and process adherence. Strong analytical and **Problem Solving** skills, complemented by a commitment to **Attention to Detail**.

My technical skills extend to **Python** and **JavaScript**, enabling collaboration with developers to enhance the testing framework. With extensive experience in CI/CD Tools, I ensure seamless integration and deployment of applications, ultimately contributing to high-quality software delivery across healthcare and financial sectors. Leveraging my background in full-stack development, I am poised to effectively bridge communication between development and QA teams, fostering an environment of continuous improvement.
